data.title: Adam Matthew Digital History Database Acquired by IUP Libraries
data.text:
AM Explorer, a major historical primary source resource, is now part of the IUP Libraries collectionpermanently! Acquisition through our consortia partner, PALCI, has made this collection of unique primary content available to the IUP community.

Millions of pages of historical content can be searched in this database through the main page. There are 88 different collections spanning historical periods from medieval times to the present.

Important themes such as political borders and migrations, gender and sexuality, global history, and war and conflict can be studied with these archival documents. Handwritten text recognition, data visualizations, video, and oral histories make these archives usable online.
